GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Click on the correct word or phrase and drag it to the correct gap.

Content.Question:
1 In my opinion Clare isn't very good. I don't think she will win the competition.
2 According to the timetable the bus arrives at eleven o'clock tomorrow morning.
3 That's the doorbell. I‘ll answer it.
4 Somebody told me Michael is going to marry Jane.
5 Look. Sylvia's a long way behind the others. I don't think she's going to win the race.
6 In the test I‘m going to answer all the questions on geography.
7 We'd better tidy up, my mother is arriving in half an hour.
8 Do you think Clive will marry Isabel?
